name: persuasion_jul_2024_onshore_wind
label: Would you support or oppose the building of onshore wind farms in your area?
source_label: FocalData MRP polling for Persuasion UK.

name: persuasion_jul_2024_net_zero_speed
label: Should government policy on climate change be going faster or slower?
source_label: FocalData MRP polling for Persuasion UK.

name: persuasion_jul_2024_borrowing
label: Would you be comfortable with government debt going up, provided that money were invested in the economy and local services?
source_label: FocalData MRP polling for Persuasion UK.

name: persuasion_jul_2024_taxes
label: Would you be comfortable paying more tax, if it meant more money were invested in public services like the NHS and education?
source_label: FocalData MRP polling for Persuasion UK.

name: persuasion_jul_2024_immigration
label: Do you think immigration has generally enriched or undermined society?
source_label: FocalData MRP polling for Persuasion UK.

name: persuasion_jul_2024_eu
label: Should the UK have closer economic ties with the EU, even if that means giving up some sovereignty?
source_label: FocalData MRP polling for Persuasion UK.

name: persuasion_jul_2024_housebuilding
label: Would you support or oppose the building of new housing in your area?
source_label: FocalData MRP polling for Persuasion UK.

name: persuasion_jul_2024_welfare
label: Should the welfare system be expanded to help more people, or reduced to make benefits harder to get?
source_label: FocalData MRP polling for Persuasion UK.

name: coastal_constituency

name: eciu_net_zero_economy
source_label: Analysis by CBI Economics and The Data City, commissioned by the Energy & Climate Intelligence Unit (ECIU).
data_file: ECIU CBI Data City net zero economy February 2024.xlsx

data_types.name: eciu_net_zero_gva
data_types.label: Economic value added by net zero businesses (£ million)
data_types.description: Estimated Gross Value Added by businesses involved in the Net Zero economy, in this constituency, in 2022–2023.

data_types.name: eciu_net_zero_gva_proportion
data_types.label: Proportion of local economic value added by net zero businesses
data_types.description: Estimated Gross Value Added by businesses involved in the Net Zero economy, in this constituency, in 2022–2023, as a proportion of total GVA.

data_types.name: eciu_net_zero_jobs
data_types.label: Total number of jobs related to the Net Zero economy
data_types.description: Estimated number of jobs involved in the Net Zero economy, in this constituency, in 2022–2023.

data_types.name: eciu_net_zero_jobs_proportion
data_types.label: Proportion of jobs related to the Net Zero economy
data_types.description: Estimated number of jobs involved in the Net Zero economy, in this constituency, in 2022–2023, as a proportion of all jobs.
